name: Noob-Platformer
tagline: A platformer I made to learn the basics of Phaser.
body:
### Platformer

This is just a little platformer I made to learn the basics of Phaser. Collect the stars and diamonds to earn points. Hitting the weird bunny creature will kill you. You lose points if the bunny gets to the stars or diamonds before you.


### Installation
Clone the repo, then run an http-server or your preferred local server and open game.html.

### Disclaimer
None of the assets included have been made by me, but they are available for fair use from phaser.io.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
